parameter_descriptions.fstoplo: Freq(Hz) in low cut stop band (default=0.10*nyquist)
parameter_descriptions.astoplo: Upper bound on amp at fstoplo (default=0.05)
parameter_descriptions.fpasslo: Freq(Hz) in low cut pass band (default=0.15*nyquist)
parameter_descriptions.apasslo: Lower bound on amp at fpasslo (default=0.95)
parameter_descriptions.fpasshi: Freq(Hz) in high cut pass band (default=0.40*nyquist)
parameter_descriptions.apasshi: Lower bound on amp at fpasshi (default=0.95)
parameter_descriptions.fstophi: Freq(Hz) in high cut stop band (default=0.55*nyquist)
parameter_descriptions.astophi: Upper bound on amp at fstophi (default=0.05)
